text:
Looks small outside but Big inside.
A Small church with 200 plus congregation but Ministry orientated.
It has outreach ministry to the rough sleepers. A growing Chinese ministry.
A good youth n children programme.
Outreach ministry to the elderly.
A vibrant Pastor with a team of support
Fm the elders. Its really a lighthouse in
The challenging ministry in the Joo chiat
District. Well done Boscombe Life Church!
Loved the service and the people. If I lived in Singapore I knew after the first service this would be my home church. The Lord is working something special here.
